page.title: 13Stanhope Fire Service
page.content: The present fire station at Stanhope was opened in 1966. It is 19 years old.However,there has been a fire service in Stanhope since 1945. So the fire service in Stanhope is 40 years old. Stanhope fire service has two fire appliances and 15 men. The Station Officer is Mr.B.Turnbull and his assistant is Mr.I.Richardson. Last year there were exactly 100 fires in Stanhope fire service's area. During this period there were 4 serious fires where assistance was needed from other appliances . The firemen check the equipment every Monday night. This equipment is safe for every fire they have to attend. To be a fireman you have to be aged 18 or over and at 55 you must retire from the service.
